issue.title: [Python] Unpin jpype1 version
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-5766](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-5766). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
According to the discussion in https://github.com/conda-forge/jpype1-feedstock/issues/8 htere are some changes that we must make to our code to stay on the released version of jpype1

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-5766?focusedCommentId=16988223) by Antoine Pitrou (apitrou):*
Hmm... I'm not sure we're testing jpype on CI anymore. `[~uwe]` you might want to take a look :-)
